Title: Welcome to the South
Writer: Massimo Gaudioso (screenplay), Dany Boon (original screenplay), Alexandre Charlot (original screenplay), Franck Magnier (original screenplay)
Actors: Claudio Bisio, Alessandro Siani, Angela Finocchiaro, Valentina Lodovini
Plot: Overwhelmed by his wife, a postal worker from Northern Italy feigns disability to request a transfer to Milan. When he's unmasked, he is sent to a tiny village near Naples for two years. He...
